thread.title: Francis Dadzie scores debut Indian Super League goal but Northeast United lose at home
thread.title_full: Francis Dadzie scores debut Indian Super League goal but Northeast United lose at home

title: Francis Dadzie scores debut Indian Super League goal but Northeast United lose at home
text:
Sports News | 15 October 2015 23:25 CET Francis Dadzie scores debut Indian Super League goal but Northeast United lose at home - www.ghanasoccernet.com Francis Dadzie celebrating his goals. 
Ghanaian striker Francis Dadzie scored his debut Indian Super League goal as his NorthEast United side suffered a 3-1 home defeat to FC Goa on Thursday. 
The on-loan forward opened the scoring on 12 when he headed home the opener at the Indira Gandhi Athletic Stadium. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us Stop drawing a devil on the wall, because if you expect the worst the worst do happen. By: FRANCIS TAWIAH(Duisb
